entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
